savoa.title: Co-Founder & Fullstack Developer @ savoa.kz
savoa.description: Developed a production-ready event platform from scratch in 2 months.
savoa.full_description: Savoa.kz is a complete platform for organizing and hosting events. The project was developed from the ground up and launched to production in 2 months with heavy use of AI tools to accelerate development.
